p: The antioxidant activity of TVH and OVEO was determined with the use of 1,2-diphenyl-1-picrylhydrazyl (DPPH) radical scavenging activity according to the method by Brand-Williams et al. [ 23]. Briefly, the ethanol solution of DPPH solution was added to dilution series of TVH and OVEO ranging from 15 to 500 for TVH and 0.8 to 100 mg/mL for OVEO and then incubated in the dark for 1 h. The absorbance was measured at 517 nm. The experiment was performed in triplicates, and average absorption was recorded for each concentration. Butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT) was used as a standard.
